name: Livli - a sámi story
description:
Please note: This game requires the original Knytt Stories to be able to run. It can be downloaded here.

Follow Livli; a headstrong, smart Sámi girl whose village has been burnt down in late 1800's Sweden. As her people are persecuted or killed, she flees from the chaos. Embarking on a perilous journey in order to find the Bear -  known as "Father Forest" he is a holy spirit and guardian deity, protecting the land and the Sámi people.
